item.description:
We have reached our RSVP limit of thirty people for our Howl-o-ween party!
For those of you who didn't RSVP in time for this halloween meetup we hope to see you at the November one.

As always, the health and saftey of our canine friends is our TOP priority! When dogs play together, it is very important that each dog is current on all of their vaccinations. These vaccinations include: DHLPP, Bordatella (canine cough) and Rabies. Please ensure that your dog is healthy and current on all vaccinations before coming to the meet ups!

group.name: The North Attleboro Small Breed Dogs Meetup Group

item.name: Halloween Meetup Party at Off The Leash
